fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) for the customer.
"The profile type.  (e.g. lender, borrower, guarantor, etc.)."
The date of the first transaction associated with this customer profile.
The date of the last transaction associated with this customer profile.
The Taxpayer ID for the customer profile.
The tax exempt code for the customer profile.  (Applies only to lender profiles).
Indicates whether the customer profile has been approved for unfunded risk.  (Applies only to lender profiles).
The number of years for which the customer profile has been approved for unfunded risk.  (Applies only to lender profiles).
The date on which the unfunded risk for this profile was last approved.
The date on which the unfunded risk for this profile is scheduled to be reviewed next.
The currency associated with the approved and used unfunded risk amounts.
The approved amount of the unfunded risk associated with this profile.  (Unfunded risk applies only to lender profiles).
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
"Indicates whether or not the customer profile has been characterized as a ""watchful account"".  (Applies only to lender profiles)."
Indicates whether or not a breakfunding agreement is in force for this profile.  (Applies only to lender profiles).
The Record ID (RID) for the profile.
The amount of the unfunded risk that has been used.
The Portfolio Action Code of the portfolio associated with this customer profile.  (Applies only to borrower profiles).
The date of the next credit review.  (Applies only to borrower profiles).
The date of the next scheduled review of the portfolio associated with this customer profile.  (Applies only to borrower profiles).
N/A
N/A
The Branch Identifier
